item.title: MMDocIR: Benchmarking Multi-Modal Retrieval for Long Documents
item.description: MMDocIR, a new benchmark dataset, enables better evaluation of multi-modal document retrieval systems by providing page-level and layout-level annotations for diverse long documents and questions.
